trans-unit.source: Represents a security token provider that provides <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosRequestorSecurityToken"></xref> security tokens for a SOAP message sender.
trans-unit.target: 表示安全令牌提供程序提供<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosRequestorSecurityToken"></xref>安全令牌为 SOAP 消息发送方。

trans-unit.source: In most instances the KerberosSecurityTokenProvider class doesn't need to be called directly, as it is called when a client sends a SOAP message that requires a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosRequestorSecurityToken> security token.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下 KerberosSecurityTokenProvider 类不需要直接调用，如就是当客户端发送 SOAP 消息需要<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosRequestorSecurityToken>安全令牌。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosRequestorSecurityToken>

trans-unit.source: Specifically, a client specifies the type of security token needed using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials> class and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials> class calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A> method to get a security token.
trans-unit.target: 具体而言，客户端指定的安全令牌所需使用一种<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials>类和<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials>类调用<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A>方法来获取安全令牌。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials>

trans-unit.source: When the security token needed is a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosRequestorSecurityToken> security token, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A> method calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.KerberosSecurityTokenProvider.GetTokenCore%28System.TimeSpan%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 所需的安全令牌时<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosRequestorSecurityToken>安全令牌<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A>方法调用<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.KerberosSecurityTokenProvider.GetTokenCore%28System.TimeSpan%29>方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.KerberosSecurityTokenProvider.GetTokenCore%28System.TimeSpan%29> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosRequestorSecurityToken>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.KerberosSecurityTokenProvider"></xref> class using the specified service principal name.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.KerberosSecurityTokenProvider"></xref>类使用指定的服务主体名称。

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the impersonation level that is allowed by a client to <xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel>`Identification`.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数设置客户端针对<xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel>允许的模拟级别`Identification`。</xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel>

trans-unit.source: The current context of the calling thread (<xref:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultNetworkCredentials%2A>) is used as a client identity.
trans-unit.target: 调用线程的当前上下文 (<xref:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultNetworkCredentials%2A>) 将用作客户端标识。</xref:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultNetworkCredentials%2A>

trans-unit.source: The service principal name to get a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosRequestorSecurityToken"></xref> security token for.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取的服务主体名称<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosRequestorSecurityToken"></xref>安全令牌。

trans-unit.source: servicePrincipalName is .
trans-unit.target: servicePrincipalNameis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.KerberosSecurityTokenProvider"></xref> class using the specified service principal name and whether a client allows a recipient of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosRequestorSecurityToken"></xref> security token to impersonate the client's credentials.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.KerberosSecurityTokenProvider"></xref>类使用指定的服务主体名称和客户端是否允许的接收方<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosRequestorSecurityToken"></xref>模拟客户端的凭据的安全令牌。

trans-unit.source: The current context of the calling thread (<xref:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultNetworkCredentials%2A>) is used as a client identity.
trans-unit.target: 调用线程的当前上下文 (<xref:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultNetworkCredentials%2A>) 将用作客户端标识。</xref:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultNetworkCredentials%2A>

trans-unit.source: The service principal name to get a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosRequestorSecurityToken"></xref> security token for.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取的服务主体名称<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosRequestorSecurityToken"></xref>安全令牌。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel> that specifies the degree to which a recipient of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosRequestorSecurityToken"></xref> security token can act on behalf of the client.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel>，它指定到的程度的接收方<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosRequestorSecurityToken"></xref>安全令牌可以代表客户端。</xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel>

trans-unit.source: tokenImpersonationLevel is not or .
trans-unit.target: tokenImpersonationLevelis not or .

trans-unit.source: servicePrincipalName is .
trans-unit.target: servicePrincipalNameis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.KerberosSecurityTokenProvider"></xref> class using the specified service principal name, client identity, and whether a client allows a recipient of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosRequestorSecurityToken"></xref> security token to impersonate the client's credentials.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.KerberosSecurityTokenProvider"></xref>类使用指定的服务主体名称、 客户端标识，以及客户端是否允许的接收方<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosRequestorSecurityToken"></xref>模拟客户端的凭据的安全令牌。

trans-unit.source: The service principal name to get a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosRequestorSecurityToken"></xref> security token for.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取的服务主体名称<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosRequestorSecurityToken"></xref>安全令牌。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel> that specifies the degree to which a recipient of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosRequestorSecurityToken"></xref> security token can act on behalf of the client process.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel>，它指定到的程度的接收方<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosRequestorSecurityToken"></xref>安全令牌可以代表客户端进程执行操作。</xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential> that represents the identity of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosRequestorSecurityToken"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential>，表示的标识<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosRequestorSecurityToken"> </xref>。</xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential>

trans-unit.source: tokenImpersonationLevel is not or .
trans-unit.target: tokenImpersonationLevelis not or .

trans-unit.source: servicePrincipalName is .
trans-unit.target: servicePrincipalNameis .

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosRequestorSecurityToken"></xref> security token.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosRequestorSecurityToken"></xref>安全令牌。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A> method is called by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials> class when a client sends a SOAP message and a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosRequestorSecurityToken> security token is needed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A>方法由调用<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials>类当客户端发送 SOAP 消息和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosRequestorSecurityToken>需要安全令牌。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosRequestorSecurityToken> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A> method calls the GetTokenCore method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A>方法调用 GetTokenCore 方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies the timeout value for the message that gets the security token.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.TimeSpan>，指定超时值获取安全令牌的消息。</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> that represents the security token to get.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"> </xref> ，它表示要获取的安全令牌。

trans-unit.source: Gets the identity of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosRequestorSecurityToken"></xref> security token.
trans-unit.target: 获取标识<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosRequestorSecurityToken"></xref>安全令牌。

trans-unit.source: When the value of the NetworkCredential property is `null` and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.KerberosSecurityTokenProvider.GetTokenCore%2A> method is called, the current context of the calling thread (<xref:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultNetworkCredentials%2A>) is used as a client identity.
trans-unit.target: NetworkCredential 属性的值时`null`和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.KerberosSecurityTokenProvider.GetTokenCore%2A>调用方法时，调用线程的当前上下文 (<xref:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultNetworkCredentials%2A>) 将用作客户端标识。</xref:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultNetworkCredentials%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.KerberosSecurityTokenProvider.GetTokenCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential> that represents the identity of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosRequestorSecurityToken"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential>，表示的标识<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosRequestorSecurityToken"> </xref>。</xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential>

trans-unit.source: Gets the service principal name of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosRequestorSecurityToken"></xref> security token to get.
trans-unit.target: 获取的服务主体名称<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosRequestorSecurityToken"></xref>要获取安全令牌。

trans-unit.source: The service principal name of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosRequestorSecurityToken"></xref> security token to get.
trans-unit.target: 服务主体名称<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosRequestorSecurityToken"></xref>要获取安全令牌。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies the degree to which a recipient of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosRequestorSecurityToken"></xref> security token can act on behalf of the client.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，指定的程度的接收方<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosRequestorSecurityToken"></xref>安全令牌可以代表客户端。

trans-unit.source: The TokenImpersonationLevel property must be either `Identification` or `Impersonation`.
trans-unit.target: TokenImpersonationLevel 属性必须为`Identification`或`Impersonation`。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel> that specifies the degree to which a recipient of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosRequestorSecurityToken"></xref> security token can act on behalf of the client.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel>，它指定到的程度的接收方<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosRequestorSecurityToken"></xref>安全令牌可以代表客户端。</xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel>
